name: Total Potential Value - Faster Collections
query:
SELECT sum("Inv. Converted USD Amount") *10*0.05/365*0.3*0.7*2
FROM
FLATTEN("defaultview-529")
WHERE
          (
            ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" ) > ("Invoice Due Date" )
          )
          OR (
            "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" ) > ("Invoice Due Date" )
signalFragment:
SELECT sum("Inv. Converted USD Amount") *10*0.05/365*0.3*0.7*2
FROM
FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
          (
            ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" ) > ("Invoice Due Date" )
          )
          OR (
            "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" ) > ("Invoice Due Date" )
